GeneDef.label: postshift recovery
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites that stabilize the carrier after a shapeshift.

customEffectDescriptions.li: If, <color=#8a8ae6>after</color> using <color=#8a8ae6>shapeshift</color>, a pawn receives this gene, then <color=#8a8ae6>xenogermination coma</color> effect <color=#8a8ae6>are removed</color>.

GeneDef.label: postshift regeneration
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites that regenerate all wounds, even critical ones, before a shapeshift.

customEffectDescriptions.li: If a pawn has this gene, it is guaranteed to <color=#8a8ae6>heal all scars</color> and <color=#8a8ae6>regrow missing parts</color> when using the <color=#8a8ae6>shapeshfit</color> ability.

GeneDef.label: postshift metabolism
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites that significantly increase metabolism after shapeshift.

customEffectDescriptions.li: If, after using the <color=#8a8ae6>shapeshift</color> ability, a pawn receives this gene, then for some time its <color=#8a8ae6>hunger</color> is significantly <color=#8a8ae6>reduced</color>.

GeneDef.label: postshift scarred
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene become covered with scars after shapeshifting.

customEffectDescriptions.li: When using the <color=#8a8ae6>shapeshift</color> ability, receiving this gene, the pawn <color=#8a8ae6>receives 5 scars</color>.
When <color=#8a8ae6>shapeshifting</color> to a form <color=#8a8ae6>without this gene</color>, the pawn <color=#8a8ae6>loses all scars</color>.

GeneDef.label: shift form
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can always return to their true form at any time.

customEffectDescriptions.li: <color=#8a8ae6>Shapeshift</color> into a xenotype with this gene <color=#8a8ae6>does not require cd</color>.
If at the moment of <color=#8a8ae6>shapeshift</color> the pawn was in <color=#8a8ae6>recovery state</color>, then bonuses from <color=#8a8ae6>postshift</color> genes will not be received.

GeneDef.label: shift deathless
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in the blood which will sustain their life processes no matter what. As long as the carrier of this gene remains a shapeshifter, it will never die.

customEffectDescriptions.li: If a pawn received this gene as a <color=#8a8ae6>shapeshifter</color>, it <color=#8a8ae6>permanently</color> receives the <color=#8a8ae6>deathless</color> effect.
